meanings.definition: The small, round, poisonous fruit of the chinaberry tree.
meanings.sent1: I saw some chinaberries on the ground near the tree.
meanings.sent2: The children were warned not to eat the chinaberries from the tree.
meanings.sent3: The birds in the garden avoided the chinaberries like they were tiny bombs.
meanings.sent4: The chinaberries hanging from the branches looked like miniature green lanterns.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the crushed chinaberries filled the air with a bitter scent.

meanings.definition: A tree of the mahogany family, native to Asia and Australia, with poisonous fruit.
meanings.sent1: The chinaberry tree in the park provided shade on sunny days.
meanings.sent2: The leaves of the chinaberry tree rustled in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels played hide-and-seek around the chinaberry tree trunk.
meanings.sent4: The chinaberry tree stood tall like a guardian of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The branches of the chinaberry tree swayed gracefully in the wind.
